generator: 1 { sudoku(R, C, V) : value(V) } 1 :- value(R), value(C).

hard_constraints.description: For every row R and every value V within the defined domain, there must exist exactly one column C such that the predicate sudoku(R, C, V) is satisfied.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1 { sudoku(R, C, V) : value(C) } 1 :- value(R), value(V).

hard_constraints.description: For every column C and every value V within the defined domain, there must exist exactly one row R such that the predicate sudoku(R, C, V) is satisfied.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: 1 { sudoku(R, C, V) : value(R) } 1 :- value(C), value(V).

hard_constraints.description: It is required that no two distinct coordinate pairs (R, C) and (S, D) mapped to the same value V are elements of the same 3x3 subgrid, where subgrid membership is determined by the floor division of coordinates by three.
